required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Physical CAM Therapies for Chronic Low Back Pain
clinical_study.official_title: Physical CAM Therapies for Chronic Low Back Pain

lead_sponsor.agency: National Center for Complementary and Integrative Health (NCCIH)

clinical_study.source: National Center for Complementary and Integrative Health (NCCIH)

brief_summary.textblock: This is a pilot randomized trial intended to evaluate the effectiveness of acupuncture, chiropractic and massage for chronic back pain in older and younger adults.
